# Mongo Setup
    docker-compose up -d
    
# Install
    pip install git+https://github.com/Flyfoxs/task_distribute@master
    pip install --upgrade --user  git+https://github.com/Flyfoxs/task_distribute@master

# Usage
    python core/locker_test.py 
    
# Jupyter
    notebook/mongo_hello.ipynb
